localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.title:
Warren Buffett has a net worth of $90 billion.

100% of that came after his seventh birthday.
blogPost.author: Michael Batnick

localize.full_text:
巴菲特的净资产为900亿美元。

100%是在他七岁生日之后。

巴菲特的淨資產爲900億美元。

100%是在他七歲生日之後。

previous.excerpt: Pexels gives you unlimited access to over 3 million free, high-resolution photos and videos – now available at your fingertips anywhere you go with a newly re-designed app.
previous.title: Pexels App 2.0 - 3M+ completely free photos and videos in one app

localize.description: Pexels 让您可以无限制地访问超过 300 万张免费的高分辨率照片和视频--现在您可以通过全新设计的应用程序随时随地获取。
localize.tagline: 3M+完全免费的照片和视频在一个应用程序中。

localize.description: Pexels 讓您可以無限制地訪問超過 300 萬張免費的高分辨率照片和視頻--現在您可以通過全新設計的應用程序隨時隨地獲取。
localize.tagline: 3M+完全免費的照片和視頻在一個應用程序中。

next.excerpt: With PayRequest Pre-Authorization you can temporary hold an amount on your customers credit card, during the hold period the funds are unavailable to the customer, the funds can be captured if needed, like checking out of a hotel, or rental security deposits.
next.title: PayRequest Pre-Authorization - Send customers pre-authorization payment links

localize.description: 通过PayRequest预授权，您可以暂时保留客户信用卡上的金额，在保留期间，客户无法使用资金，如果需要的话，资金可以被抓取，比如酒店退房，或者租赁保证金。
localize.tagline: 向客户发送预授权支付链接

localize.description: 通過PayRequest預授權，您可以暫時保留客戶信用卡上的金額，在保留期間，客戶無法使用資金，如果需要的話，資金可以被抓取，比如酒店退房，或者租賃保證金。
localize.tagline: 向客戶發送預授權支付鏈接
